org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.logical

Class ContentObjectRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.logical.ContentObjectRelation

  • public class ContentObjectRelation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a relation between two page content objects (e.g. parent-child relation).
    Author:
    clc
